de.zorgk.drums
Interface HitDecorator

All Known Implementing Classes:
HumanTimingDecorator, HumanVelocityDecorator
public interface HitDecorator

interface for decorating hitinterfaces

Author:
immanuel

Method Summary
 boolean cancelsOut(HitDecorator other, java.lang.String drumName)
          a HitDecorator cancels another HitDecorator, if for all HitInterfaces h: this.decorate(h) equals this.decorate(other.decorate(h)) for example a decorator that overrides the dB parameter to -2. cancels any hit decorator modifying just the dB parameter.
 HitInterface decorate(HitInterface drum, java.lang.String drumName)
          decorates a given HitInterface
 

Method Detail

decorate

HitInterface decorate(HitInterface drum,
                      java.lang.String drumName)
decorates a given HitInterface

Parameters:
drum - interface to be decorated
drumName - name of the drum that is decorated
Returns:
new interface incorporating the decoration

cancelsOut

boolean cancelsOut(HitDecorator other,
                   java.lang.String drumName)
a HitDecorator cancels another HitDecorator, if for all HitInterfaces h: this.decorate(h) equals this.decorate(other.decorate(h)) for example a decorator that overrides the dB parameter to -2. cancels any hit decorator modifying just the dB parameter. this function may return true even though both HitDecorators would not cancel out each other, for instance to ensure that only one version of your class affects the drum output

Parameters:
other -
drumName - name of the drum that is decorated
Returns:
true, if this interface cancels other
